title: Power of appointment, removal
context: ยง302A-1114 Power of appointment, removal. The department, from time to time, may appoint and remove such teachers, educational officers, and other personnel as may be necessary for carrying out the purposes of sections 302A-201, 302A-401 to 302A-410, 302A-1001 to 302A-1004, 302A-1101 to 302A-1122, 302A-1301 to 302A-1305, 302A-1401 to 302A-1403, and 302A-1503 to 302A-1506, and regulate their duties, powers, and responsibilities, when not otherwise provided by law. [L 1996, c 89, pt of ยง2; am L 1999, c 62, ยง4; am L 2012, c 133, ยง14] Note Section 302A-410 referred to in text is repealed.
